content: Turning to 2023 guidance, we're expecting full year revenue between $15 million and $20 million, weighted in the back half of the year as we launch series production and unit volume begins to ramp. And so, there will be a mix of take rates, whether it's the high end luxury vehicle, could be up to 100% versus the mid-grade models, which don't start until next year, where the take rate could be a little bit lower, but theyâre higher volume platform.
